## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G03840](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G03840)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>IDD3, MGP</u>
- **Gene Name:** INDETERMINATE DOMAIN 3, Magpie
- **Description:**   C2H2 and C2HC zinc fingers superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
